name: Skyline
description:
Do you need a special gift for someone who loves Pittsburgh? This oval piece celebrates our distinctive skyline on a gold and black background, highlighted with touches of red and blue.

Sold exclusively at Welcome Pittsburgh Information and Gift Shop in the lobby of Fifth Avenue Place, downtown.

name: Pittsburgh
description:
This piece boldly displays any of your special items. The colors of Pittsburgh are combined to make a beautiful sushi set, but it can be used for anything! Colorful Red, Blue and Gold colors just pop off the shiny black background, all cradled in a gold base. 

Sold exclusively at Welcome Pittsburgh Information and Gift Shop in the lobby of Fifth Avenue Place, downtown.

name: Prewine
description:
This beautiful piece was "made from scratch!" Textured clear glass layered together with transparent violet and amber grapes that feel like you can pull them right off the top! Beautifully slumped into a unique presentation at your next dinner event! 

12" x 12" 

$84

name: Say Cheese!
description:
Have you ever seen a cuter piece to serve your cheese? I didn't think so. Have some fun at your next gathering and fill it with cheddar or gouda or limburger if you dare!!! Smile and say cheese!!

Approx. 12" x 7"

$34

name: The King
description:
The King has arrived! This Crown Royal dish will stand out on your bar! Fill it with peanuts and candies and your guests will take notice!

Approx. 6" x 6"
Complete with rubber feet on the bottom to protect surfaces.

$34

name: Blootle

This is a great gift for anyone who wants to have a little bit 'o fun! Bright colors adorn the shimmery blue glass which will catch all of your incense ashes! IF you just want to use the bottle for something else, simply pull out the incense and voila!! Serve your favorite treat!

approx. 12" x 3" 

$34

One side red! One side white! You can be a flip flopper with this one!! Get this one for your next party and you can decide. Crushed glass bubbles up on the surface to add a whimsical texture.

$34

This clear glass bottle was molded with a swirly pattern on the bottom. Glass "swirlies" were added to the top to add a pop of sunny color! Anyone would love this incense holder - and the ashes won't go anywhere but in the bottle! If you don't want it to hold incense, simply pull it out and use it for anything!

Make mine a double!!! This one is a fine selection for your next event. The bubbles on the inside are gone, but the outside has been adorned with grapes and a little whimsy. Cheers!!

name: Olive You!
description:
I really do!! And you should show "olive" your friends how much you love them with this nifty little numberI It always spurs a smile. And you can treat "olive" your party guests to a treat! OK, I know. "Olive" these puns are getting a little annoying. Going now. I apologize. To......"olive" you.   Sorry.

$34

Approx. 12" x 3"

She's an earthy girl, this one. Warm French Vanilla glass alongside transparent emerald and amber tones in a flowing pattern. Serve something on this piece and be sure to have wine and relax. She likes to relax. Bring her home.

Does your company have a vision? Let's capture it in glass!
